actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troglodyte attacks with its bite and its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage  and the target makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it is infected with Troglodyte Stench.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: A non-troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to a troglodytes Stench for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Perception checks that rely on sight.
